name: easy-intercept
description: Simplest Javascript interception library on the planet!
author: Buddhike de Silva

scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --compilers js:babel-core/register -R spec -r test/setup.js test/*{,*/}*.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ --exec 'npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build'
